title: Largest Ever Recorded Packet Per Second-Based DDoS Attack Mitigated by Akamai
description: On June 21, 2020, Akamai mitigated the largest packet per second (PPS) distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack ever recorded on the Akamai platform. The attack generated 809 million packets per second (Mpps), targeting a large European bank.
author: Tom Emmons
